name: Orders with incorrectly calculated value
description: It may happen that there are orders from which total revenue does not match the sum of revenue for each individual product in order. A different amount displayed for revenue and individual product revenue can indicate that a given price is not properly calculated in the subtotal of the order.

constants.name: permittedSumDeviation
constants.description: level above which deviations are considered to be incorrect and not due to rounding of numbers

blocks.description: The test compares sum of revenue of products in orders and the values of the whole order. If they do not match, it fails.
blocks.passMessage: For all orders the sum of products in order equals to the value of whole order.
blocks.failMessage: There are orders, by which the sum of products in order does not equal to the value of whole order.
blocks.failHowtofix: You need to check the measurement of order value.
